thread.section_title: The Surrey - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Always improving
thread.title_full: Always improving - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LeeBermuda
title: Always improving
text: Our trillionth stay here, and the service, rooms and food continue to excel. We always enjoy the Surrey Bar, where we often have dinner as well. They even updated their pillows to the highest quality of late. I hope that they'll change their phones some day, as theirs are too high-tech for us to use. Otherwise, can't beat it.
